mapper.sql: id, pcdi_type_id, topic_title, topic_result_one, topic_result_two, states, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into xyd_pcid_optional (id, pcdi_type_id, topic_title, topic_result_one, topic_result_two, states, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcdiTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topicTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicResultOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicResultTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{states,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into xyd_pcid_optional
id,
pcdi_type_id,
topic_title,
topic_result_one,
topic_result_two,
states,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update xyd_pcid_optional
pcdi_type_id = #{pcdiTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
topic_title = #{topicTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topic_result_one = #{topicResultOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topic_result_two = #{topicResultTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
states = #{states,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xyd_pcid_optional set pcdi_type_id = #{pcdiTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, topic_title = #{topicTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topic_result_one = #{topicResultOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topic_result_two = #{topicResultTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, states = #{states,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select xpo.*, xar.answer from xyd_pcid_optional xpo , xyd_answer_results xar where xar.answer_id = #{answerRecordId} AND xpo.id = xar.topic_id and xpo.pcdi_type_id = #{pcidTypeId} AND xar.topic_type = #{pcidTypeId} AND xpo.states = "1" ORDER BY xpo.create_time ASC
